name: Fab Four Vol. 1
overview: A compilation of 4 Audiogenic games. It was released on both cassette and floppy disk formats: Omega Orb a single player arcade adventure by Peter Scott. It was originally published by Audiogenic in 1987 and later reissued by Atlantis. Psycastria 2 a horizontally scrolling shooter for up to 4 players by Gary Partis. A sequel to Psycastria, it was originally published by Audiogenic in 1988 and later reissued by Atlantis. Note that the box front of the cassette version had the game misnamed as Psycastria. The back cover as well as the actual cassette had it correctly titled as Psycastria 2. Sphere of Destiny 2 a single player ball control game by Gary Partis. A sequel to Sphere of Destiny, it was first published as part of this compilation. Note that the box front of the cassette version had the game misnamed as Sphere of Destiny. The back cover as well as the actual cassette had it correctly titled as Sphere of Destiny 2. Thunderstruck II: The Mindmaster a single player arcade adventure by Peter Scott. A sequel to Thunderstruck, it was originally published by Audiogenic in 1986.
